about_the_game:
LineHold online CO-OP Twin Stick Shooter mixed with Tower Defense. Survive as long as you can and expand your base as much as you can before next waves comes.

Tower Defense + Base Building

Create your base filled with different turrets and buildings such as cloning unit, radar and many others. Additionally use indestructible nodes that you can use to build intricate maze for your enemies and block off strategic paths. Your planning and foresight will help you live longer.

Character Progression

Choose your speciality and adjust unlocked skills to your gameplay! You decide what your character will be better at by choosing new skills and perks. And with each level you unlock more weapons and structures.

Vast Arsenal

Fight waves of enemies swarming your base using 10 different weapons - each of them has two firing modes. Use them to create combo effects for maximum damage. Keep shooting as your second weapon is reloading in the meantime - NON STOP ACTION!

Campaign Mode and Survival Mode

Progress through more and more challenging missions in campaign or try to survive as long as possible in survival mode and compete with other players on the leaderboard.

Adapt your Strategy to your Enemies

Some are simple brutes, some will try to pull you into the horde, and some will create more enemies upon death. Know your enemies and then prioritize your targets to ensure your survival. Build defenses that are best suited to eliminate swarming enemies.
